description: This file initializes a PDF knowledge base, loads it, creates an agent with this knowledge, and prompts the agent to respond to a query.

classes.name: PDFKnowledgeBase
classes.description: Class representing a knowledge base built from PDF documents.

classes.name: PDFReader
classes.description: Class responsible for reading and processing PDF files.

classes.name: PgVector
classes.description: Class representing a vector database interface using PostgreSQL with pgvector.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Class representing an AI agent that interacts with the knowledge base.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Method to load or reload the knowledge base, with an option to recreate it.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Method for the agent to output a response to a query, optionally formatted in markdown.
